function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Proper treatment and disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater before discharge","Technologies":"Radiation disinfection technology, reverse polymerization disinfection technology, plasma disinfection technology, thermal gasification disinfection technology","People":"People in the vicinity of the hospital, waste management workers, agricultural workers","Owner":"Government, hospital management, waste management personnel"},{"Description":"Use of contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, contamination of agricultural produce","Mitigation":"Strict prohibition of using contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Agricultural workers, consumers","Owner":"Government, waste management personnel"},{"Description":"Lack of qualified personnel for waste management and disposal","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and spread of diseases through improper waste management","Mitigation":"Training and qualification of personnel, implementation of personal protection measures","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Personnel involved in waste management and disposal","Owner":"Hospital management, waste management personnel"}]}
